FAQ: Is Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 suitable for my dog?

Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 is a weight loss dog food for overweight dogs. In trials, it has been shown to help overweight dogs lose 2.2% of their body weight per week.

It’s also suitable for:
  • Regulating blood sugar in diabetic dogs, but only those who are obese (for diabetic dogs already at a healthy weight, try Dog Weight Loss & Control W2 instead).
  • Managing fibre-responsive colitis.
  • Managing lipid metabolism disorders (hyperlipidaemia).

Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 is not suitable for puppies, pregnant/lactating dogs, and dogs with chronic kidney disease.
My dog has reached their target weight – what should I feed them now?

Congrats! Now that your dog has reached a healthy weight, you can help them stay there by switching to Weight Loss & Control W2 weight control dog food. With more energy per portion, this food is ideal for stabilising your dog's weight.
What's the difference between Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 and Weight Loss & Control W2?

Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 is designed for overweight dogs, with or without diabetes, to help them reach a healthy weight. In the case of diabetes, it can also help to regulate blood sugar.

Weight Loss & Control W2 is ideal both for helping your dog to lose weight, and for helping them to maintain a stable weight long-term. It can also help to regulate blood sugar in dogs with diabetes, but in this case, it is only suitable for dogs already at a healthy weight.

Always consult your vet when switching between these two foods as portions may need to be adjusted to avoid weight gain.

Name.en-GB: HPM Diet - Dog W1 Weight Loss & Diabetes
Name.en: HPM Diet - Dog W1 Weight Loss & Diabetes

B2C Short description.en-GB: en-GB Helps your dog to lose excess weight and regulate their blood sugar. Weight loss doesn’t have to mean hunger, with a high-protein, high-fibre recipe to keep your dog happy and satisfied on their journey to a healthy weight.
B2C Short description.en: Helps your dog to lose excess weight and regulate their blood sugar. Weight loss doesn’t have to mean hunger, with a high-protein, high-fibre recipe to keep your dog happy and satisfied on their journey to a healthy weight.

B2C Full Description.en-GB:
en-GB Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 weight loss dog food
Help your dog to shed excess weight quickly with Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 weight loss dog food.


Weight loss for dogs isn’t as simple as cutting down their portion sizes. To make sure your dog is losing weight the healthy way, you need a complete and balanced weight control dog food with low energy density, like Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1.


Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1:


• Contains the ideal ratio of high protein and low carbohydrates to help your dog preserve muscle mass while they lose fat.

• Prevents glucose spikes after eating and keeps blood sugar stable, helping to manage diabetes.

• Keeps your dog happy with a tasty combination of rich animal proteins and satisfying fats.


Because excess weight can be tough on the joints, Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 contains chondroitin and chitosan to protect the joints and halt degenration. It also features extra vitamins and minerals to make sure your dog is getting all the nutrients they need from smaller rations.
B2C Full Description.en:
Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 weight loss dog food

Help your dog to shed excess weight quickly with Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 weight loss dog food.

Weight loss for dogs isn’t as simple as cutting down their portion sizes. To make sure your dog is losing weight the healthy way, you need a complete and balanced weight control dog food with low energy density, like Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1.

Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1:

• Contains the ideal ratio of high protein and low carbohydrates to help your dog preserve muscle mass while they lose fat.
• Prevents glucose spikes after eating and keeps blood sugar stable, helping to manage diabetes.
• Keeps your dog happy with a tasty combination of rich animal proteins and satisfying fats.

Because excess weight can be tough on the joints, Dog Weight Loss & Diabetes W1 contains chondroitin and chitosan to protect the joints and halt degenration. It also features extra vitamins and minerals to make sure your dog is getting all the nutrients they need from smaller rations.

Composition.en:
Dehydrated pork and poultry proteins, potato starch*, lignocellulose, hydrolysed pork and poultry proteins, faba bean hulls, animal fats, minerals, linseed, beet pulp, psyllium fibre (Plantago (L.) spp.), fructo-oligosaccharides, brewers yeast, hydrolysed crustacean (source of chitosan), Lactobacillus acidophilus, chondroitin sulfate.

*carbohydrate sources

VETERINARY HPM®  contains no artificial flavours or colours.
